case.title: Le Chocolate for Vanilla Creme - 45
case.text: Beautiful Black Slim and Sexy woman seeks Older White Gentlemen For LTR. I'm for real. My height is 5 7," I weigh 125 pounds, I'm slim but shapely. Dark almond shape eyes and a great smile. Knows how to treat a man when he's naughty or nice. No subs please. Must live in the NYC area. Send a picture, your location, age and height in your email. I'll be waiting......
